templateOptions.label: 1.2 Justification of the use of biological agents, genetically modified organisms, hazardous chemicals, Radioactive substances and/or nanoparticles

fieldGroup.template: Briefly explain (maximum ten lines) the need to use biological agents, genetically modified organisms, hazardous chemicals, radioactive substances and/or nanoparticles.

Hazardous chemicals (hazardous chemicals*),* according to Regulation (EC) No. 1272/2008 on classification, labelling and packaging of substances and mixtures (CLP).

Radioactive substances and radioactive facilities, according to the regulations contained in Spanish Royal Decrees 1836/1999 and 783/2001. Radiological equipment, according to Spanish Royal Decree 1085/2009, of July 3 2009, which approves the Regulation on the installation and use of X-ray equipment for medical diagnostic purposes.
